scripts.start: budo js/main.js -ol -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 ] ] | garnish
scripts.build:js: browserify js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 ] ] -p licensify | uglifyjs -m -c warnings=false --comments '/This header is generated by licensify/' -o public/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run rm && npm run html && npm run build:js && npm run cp
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run ghpages
